mapper.select: SELECT distinct ATT_SCT_ID attSctId, S.SCT_TERM cmSctTerm FROM EMR.DIC_SNOMEDCT_ATT_VAL A inner join EMR.CM_SNOMEDCT S on A.ATT_SCT_ID = S.SCT_ID;
SELECT A.VAL_SCT_ID attSctId, S.SCT_TERM cmSctTerm FROM EMR.DIC_SNOMEDCT_ATT_VAL A inner join EMR.CM_SNOMEDCT S on A.VAL_SCT_ID = S.SCT_ID where ATT_SCT_ID = #{value};
